definitions.title: vb. scrape
definitions.body: (Ar. sah.a0 (sh.w, and sh.y Lane:1322) scrape off, clear away; cf. Talm. [[סְחוּתָא]], [[סְחִיתָא]] refuse, Targum [[סְחִיתָא]] dirt, dung);—only

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: scrape clean, scour, Pf. 1 S. consec. [[וְסִחֵתִ֫י עֲפָרָהּ מֶּנׇּהָ]] Ez Eze 26:4 and I will scrape clean her dust from her.
